a formal semantics for computer languages and its application in a compiler semantic meta language has been developed representing the meanings of statements in large class computer languages this basis construction an efficient functioning compiler an informal discussion based on example complete translator small is presented cacm january 1966 feldman j ca660101 jb march 3 1978 4 31 pm 1046 1496 1086 1105 1139 1140 1234 1263 1265 1683 1768 1781 1787 1824 1945 2061 2126 2546 464 584 631 653 680 763 795 799 945 1137 5 1141 1396 1767 1860 1988 2252 404 823 6 123 196 914 915 917 919 964 984 989 990 1007 1012 1028 1029 1083 1084 1098 1122 1131 1132 1138 1149 1198 1200 1214 1215 1223 1278 1303 1323 1334 1336 1358 1365 1366 1386 1387 1388 1389 1392 1393 1394 1395 1397 1421 1455 1460 1462 1463 1467 1468 1477 1487 1491 1531 1535 1565 1601 1602 1613 1614 1626 1641 1785 1786 1788 205 224 249 284 288 316 378 381 398 11 14 2155 407 410 463 483 3184 3188 3199 3200 3201 3202 3203 3204 561 600 669 691 730
